forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: anyland time

comments.text: anyland time, which equals universal time/ utc, is shown at the back of the main ring dialog.
you can use it to organize events, for instance, so everyone knows what time you mean.
if you google "utc time" in your browser, google will also tell you the current utc/ anyland time.
you can show the anyland time in text creations by using placeholders like [hour]... all placeholders will be shown if you toggle to the extended keyboard when typing.

thread.latestCommentText: you can show the anyland time in text creations by using placeholders like [hour]... all placeholders will be shown if you toggle to the extended keyboard when typing.
